content: List out 55 words that end with 'tion'.

I'm here to help! Here are 55 words that end with "tion":

1. Information
2. Education
3. Situation
4. Population
5. Application
6. Communication
7. Reservation
8. Operation
9. Organization
10. Transportation
11. Celebration
12. Imagination
13. Activation
14. Citation
15. Donation
16. Foundation
17. Generation
18. Invitation
19. Nation
20. Relation
21. Station
22. Creation
23. Destination
24. Election
25. Solution
26. Revolution
27. Salvation
28. Vacation
29. Action
30. Relation
31. Function
32. Option
33. Condition
34. Attention
35. Mention
36. Suggestion
37. Promotion
38. Competition
39. Collaboration
40. Meditation
41. Initiation
42. Creation
43. Registration
44. Investigation
45. Exploration
46. Reservation
47. Presentation
48. Celebration
49. Activation
50. Salvation
51. Imagination
52. Application
53. Communication
54. Operation
55. Organization

I hope this list meets your needs! If you have any more questions or need further assistance, feel free to ask.
